section.title: Four-Inch Pipe
section.p: The water heaters covered in this manual are certified to a minimum length of four-inch pipe for the vent (exhaust) of 15 equivalent feet (4.6 m). There is no minimum equivalent feet requirement for the intake air pipe.

section.title: Six-Inch Pipe
section.p: The water heaters covered in this manual are certified to a minimum length of six-inch pipe for the vent (exhaust) of 70 equivalent feet (21.3 m). There is no minimum equivalent feet requirement for the intake air pipe.
